about.description:
This module defines the segment and segmentlist objects, as well as the
infinity object used to define semi-infinite and infinite segments.

name: ligo-segments
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "ligo-segments" %}
{% set version = "1.2.0" %}
{% set sha256 = "5edbcb88cae007c4e154a61cb2c9d0a6d6d4016c1ecaf0a59a667a267bd20e7a" %}

package:
  name: {{ name }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}
  patches:
    # rename __nonzero__ -> __bool__
    - 0001-ligo.segments-rename-__nonzero__-to-__bool__.patch
    # fix bug in doctests
    - 0002-.value_slice_to_index-adjust-expectations.patch
    # build pure-python library on windows for python2
    - pure-python-windows.patch  # [win and py<30]
    # rename min max for windows
    - minmax.patch  # [win]

build:
  number: 0
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . --no-deps --ignore-installed -vv "

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ compiler('c') }}  # [not (win and py<30)]
  host:
    - python
    - setuptools
    - pip
  run:
    - python
    - six
    - ligo-common

test:
  imports:
    - ligo.segments
    # utils requires LAL, which is [not win]
    - ligo.segments.utils  # [not win]
  source_files:
    - test/*.py
  requires:
    - python-lal  # [not win]
  commands:
    - python test/segments_verify.py
    - python test/segments_utils_verify.py  # [not win]
    # inspect links
    - conda inspect linkages -p ${PREFIX} ${PKG_NAME}  # [not win]
    - conda inspect objects -p ${PREFIX} ${PKG_NAME}  # [osx]

about:
  home: https://git.ligo.org/lscsoft/{{ name }}
  license: GPLv3
  license_family: GPL
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: Representations of semi-open intervals
  description: |
    This module defines the segment and segmentlist objects, as well as the
    infinity object used to define semi-infinite and infinite segments.

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - duncanmmacleod
